channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: AOC floats Trump impeachment over Iran strikes
item.description: Rep. Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez (D-N.Y.) on Saturday floated the prospect of impeaching President Trump for striking Iran without explicit authorization...

item.title: Trump claims U.S. strikes "obliterated" Iran's key nuclear facilities
item.description: The U.S. military conducted airstrikes on Iran 's nuclear facilities in Fordow, Natanz and Isfahan on Sunday morning local time. The latest: In a hist...

item.title: Top Democrats left in dark on Iran strike plans
item.description: Top Democrats on Capitol Hill say they weren't briefed in advance of the U.S. attack on Iran on Saturday, multiple sources familiar with the discussio...

item.title: MAGA unites around Trump over Iran strikes — for now
item.description: President Trump 's MAGA movement appeared to largely coalesce late Saturday in supporting his decision to strike Iranian nuclear sites, despite its bi...

item.title: Trump's Iran strikes meet bipartisan blowback in Congress over war powers
item.description: While most congressional Republicans and some pro-Israel Democrats are praising President Trump's strikes on Iranian nuclear facilities , pockets of o...

item.title: U.S. warplanes strike three Iranian nuclear sites in sweeping attack
item.description: The bombing is a major escalation by President Donald Trump, tethering the United States to a conflict with no clear end in sight.

item.title: Trump, Vance attending fundraisers on opposite sides of the country
item.description: Get the latest news on President Donald Trump’s second term in the White House and the Republican-led Congress.

item.title: Columbia protester Mahmoud Khalil freed from ICE detention
Trump undermines Watergate laws in massive shift of ethics system
item.description: Congress built a system 50 years ago to prevent another Nixon. Trump seems determined to dismantle those rules.

item.title: After Virginia elections, governor’s race begins a new phase
item.description: The summer campaign season launched Saturday in Richmond as Democrat Abigail Spanberger and Republican Winsome Earle-Sears heated up the race for gove...

item.title: Trump is under water on some of his top issues — including immigration, poll shows
item.description: The president’s approval rating had been ticking upward since its biggest drop in April.

item.title: Trump’s contract-cutting blitz rattles a once-flourishing DC industry

item.title: Trump’s chaotic economy is causing headaches for Democrats in New Jersey's governor race
item.description: The crowded contest in the Garden State shows how hard it is to address pocketbook issues.

item.title: Warren Buffett shocks shareholders by announcing his intention to retire at the end of the year
item.description: Earlier, Buffett warned Saturday about the dire global consequences of President Donald Trump's tariffs.

item.title: ‘Anything can happen’: Trump doesn't seem fazed by recession worries
item.description: Trump has blamed shaky economic numbers on his predecessor.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
